https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fbjJxCMJZq9GfHCpEjuGqDWppKO.jpg Antoine has what every young single man could wish: a promising career, true and loyal friends, and an apartment of his own. However, he's a lonely man, until he meets Clara, a beautiful and exciting woman, and deeply falls in love with her. All his loneliness turns into joy... but then he learns something that makes it all extremely complicated. Clara and Me
